name: Burning Love (SetsunaHelmi)
description:
Search and catch Living Love that live inside creatures in the wild to make sure Flame of Love always alive. Use focus eye to search for it and beware of Living Virus that could infect and destroy Living Love. 

Tips: you cannot see with naked eyes.

Control:
WASD to Move
Mouse to hover

How To Play:
Search Living Love inside the body of the creature. Tap on it 3 times to catch it.
Repeat until certain amount.
